Name: Sacred Staff
Description:
A mystical healer's staff that, once fully energized, can stream purifying energy up to 12 meters. Heal other teens to energize the staff.

If all living teens are Healthy, it will start to energize itself.

Misc.ToolTip: The amount of time required to craft the Sacred Staff.
The amount of time the Sacred Staff can continuously or gradually be fired from full charge before being completely depleted.
The amount of continuous damage required by the Sacred Staff in order to wound or stun the monster.
The range of the Sacred Staff's beam.
The amount of charge the Sacred Staff receives upon the full heal of a teen.
The amount of charge the Sacred Staff receives per second when all teens are healthy.
The amount of time it takes for the Sacred Staff to warm up when initially trying to fire it.
The bonus multiplier applied to teen heal speed when being healed by the Sacred Staff.
The penalty multiplier applied to a teen's heal speed when self healing with the Sacred Staff.
The movement speed multiplier applied to teens when aiming the Sacred Staff (firing).
The minimum movement speed multiplier applied to the monster while being damaged by the Sacred Staff.
The maximum movement speed multiplier applied to the monster while being damaged by the Sacred Staff.

WeaponMods.Name: Beacon of Light
WeaponMods.Description:
+ While the Sacred Staff is not yet energized your aura is revealed to your Injured allies.
- The crafting time of the Sacred Staff is increased by 15%.

Misc.ToolTip: The penalty multiplier applied to the crafting time of the Sacred Staff while running Beacon of Light.

WeaponMods.Name: Trial of Suffering
WeaponMods.Description: * If you finish crafting the Sacred Staff while in a Healthy state, you will be put into the Injured state.

WeaponMods.Name: Miraculous Recovery
WeaponMods.Description:
+ If you lose an energized Sacred Staff by being knocked down, you will recover up to 20% of your base Life based on the energy that was remaining in the weapon.
- The Sacred Staff consumes 20% more energy when firing.

Misc.ToolTip: The maximum amount of base Life you may recover from being knocked down while holding a Sacred Staff running Miraculous Recovery.
The penalty multiplier applied to the Sacred Staff's consumption rate when firing.

WeaponMods.Name: Pure Sacrifice
WeaponMods.Description: * While you are not at Critical Health and the Sacred Staff is not energized, it will gain up to 50% of the energy needed, but you will lose 1% of your base Life per second.

Misc.ToolTip: The maximum amount of charge the Sacred Staff can get from the Life stealing properties of Pure Sacrifice.
The amount of base Life lost per second when meeting the conditions to activate a Sacred Staff running Pure Sacrifice.

WeaponMods.Name: Revelations
WeaponMods.Description:
+ When healing using the Sacred Staff, the healing speed is increased by 20%.
- When healing using the Sacred Staff, your aura is revealed to the monster.

Misc.ToolTip: The bonus multiplier applied to teen heal speed when healing with a Sacred Staff running Revelations.
